name: ARIS Report Script Model File
summary: Learn about .RSM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: Script used by ARIS business reporting software; generates a report when run in the software and includes information about the database at the Model level, which is a logical division of the business database (other levels are Database, Group, and Object); used for generating business intelligence reports.
